description: Options passed to the postcss-bootstrap-4-grid plugin.

gridColumns.description: The number of column units to generate CSS for.

gridGutterWidth.description: A CSS value (with a unit) representing the distance between columns.

containerMaxWidths.description: The maximum widths of a container at a set of breakpoints.

gridBreakpoints.description: A set of breakpoints for generating different layouts at differing view widths.

doOrderClasses.description: Set to true to generate the classes that handle flexbox order.

doOffsetClasses.description: Set to true to generate the classes handling column offsets.
